SELECT te.id , tu.nickname , tu.real_name , tu.phone_number , te.message , te.location , te.latitude , te.longitude , te.remark , te.create_time , te.status FROM `emergency` AS te LEFT JOIN `user` AS tu ON tu.id = te.user_id WHERE tu.deleted = 0
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.nickname}, '%')
AND tu.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.realName}, '%')
AND tu.phone_number = #{params.phoneNumber}
AND te.status = #{params.status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(te.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY te.status, te.create_time
